postBootScript: git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools; cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/; python setup.py install; cp /root/host-key-tools/host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system; sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/18.221.238.74:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -i NODENAME/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service; systemctl enable host-key-tools.service; service host-key-tools.service start;wget http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/storage.sh -O /root/storage.sh;sed -i 's/REPLACE/CIDR/g' /root/storage.sh;sed -i 's/STITCH/SIP/g' /root/storage.sh;echo 'net.ipv4.ip_forward=1' >> /etc/sysctl.conf; sysctl -p;sh /root/storage.sh > /var/log/komal.log 2>&1
